text:
Has anyone found a way to test Membership functionality from within a sandbox account?  I found this community post (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Sandbox-testing-private-content-membership/td-p/635204>) from someone having the same problem.  It seems they never really found a good solution.  Is there a work-around of some sort?

All I really need, is some way to assign login credentials to one of my "contacts" in the sandbox account.
